Question: In July 1965, this person released the single "Like a Rolling Stone", which peaked at number two in the U.S.
Hints: This person has been described as one of the most influential figures of the 20th century, musically and culturally.
This person subsequently said of Grossman, "He was kind of like a Colonel Tom Parker figure ..
In October 2004, this person published the first part of his autobiography, Chronicles: Volume One.
